meanings.definition: A photograph or picture taken with a camera.
meanings.sent1: I have a photo of my family on the wall.
meanings.sent2: She keeps a photo of her dog in her wallet.
meanings.sent3: The photo of the cat wearing sunglasses always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: The photo of the sunset painted the sky with colors.
meanings.sent5: The photo of the rainbow after the storm was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: The photo in the magazine caught my attention.
meanings.sent2: He took a photo of the city skyline at night.
meanings.sent3: The photo of the talking animals in the book was amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her words painted a photo of a magical world in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The photo of the snow-covered mountains was etched in my memory.
